projects.name: School Portal Management
projects.shortDescription: A School Management System for administrators, teachers, and students.
projects.fullDescription:
This web-based school portal management system was developed as part of a group project in the Web Technologies course. I was responsible for implementing the principal's dashboard and features. The project includes functionality such as student and teacher management, staff management, announcements, fund management, and communication. The dashboard provides key insights, including student performance tracking and employee overviews.

Key features include:
- Dashboard overview with student, teacher, and staff statistics
- Fund management and balance tracking
- Viewing and managing top-performing students
- Employee overview with salary, subjects, and positions
- Announcements management (adding and viewing)
- Policies and rules management
- Communication tools for staff coordination
- Secure authentication and role-based access control

projects.name: Job Portal BD
projects.shortDescription: A Basic Job Portal where employers and job seekers can search for Employers or Jobs.
projects.fullDescription:
Job Portal BD is a web-based platform for both employers and job seekers. It has basic functions and a minimal UI design. I developed this project using my foundational knowledge of HTML, CSS, PHP, and some JavaScript while learning Web Technologies in my university.

Key features include:
- User authentication for job seekers and employers using sessions
- Profile management with resume upload functionality
- Job application and save system
- Employer dashboard to post new job listings
- Database management using MySQL

projects.name: Believe - Student Shopping Center
projects.shortDescription: An E-commerce starter app which I built for my friend
projects.fullDescription:
This Flutter-based eCommerce mobile application was developed as my first app project and was created for a friend. The app provides a simple and user-friendly shopping experience where users can browse products and place orders easily.

The application allows users to create accounts using google sign in option and can update their profiles, add their phone number and delivery address, and manage their orders. Users can add products to the cart, place orders, track order status, and make payments using bKash. The app is designed to be straightforward and easy to use, similar to other common eCommerce apps.

Key features include:
- Product browsing and item selection
- User profile management (name, phone number, address)
- Add to cart and order placement
- Order tracking and order history
- Simple and clean user interface
- Secure user authentication using Firebase google sign in
